item.description:
This month we will be giving an Introduction to Dreamweaver ... it will include an introduction to the workspace, using templates, styling pages, adding content, design and code view, quick code overview, how to make links for multiple pages, etc.

This is an application that we've had a lot of request to cover. Even if you already know how to use it, you may have questions or something that you would like to share. We welcome all levels of expertise and appreciate input whenever possible.

Hope to see you all on Thursday night!!
item.name: April Manchester Adobe User Group Meeting ...
